name: heka402-circuits
description: Circom circuits for Heka402 privacy payments

scripts.compile: command -v circom >/dev/null 2>&1 && circom payment.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym || (echo '' && echo '‚ùå ERROR: circom 2.0 not found in PATH.' && echo '' && echo 'üì¶ Install circom 2.0 using one of these methods:' && echo '' && echo '  Option 1 (macOS): brew install circom' && echo '  Option 2: Download from https://github.com/iden3/circom/releases' && echo '  Option 3: Build from source (requires Rust)' && echo '' && echo 'See circuits/INSTALL.md for detailed instructions.' && echo '' && exit 1)
scripts.setup: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 14 pot14_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot14_0000.ptau pot14_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot14_0001.ptau pot14_final.ptau -v && snarkjs groth16 setup payment.r1cs pot14_final.ptau payment_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute payment_0000.zkey payment_0001.zkey --name="1st Contributor Name" -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey payment_0001.zkey verification_key.json
